text:
Hi Everyone,
I am trying to follow this tutorial for creating a customised XP on HubSpot.
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJRzMGKbjuI>

I’m falling short on trying to upload my base project project cause I don’t have a development Sandbox.

I registered as a dev and have a dev account.
still can’t upload the project on it neither can I create a dev sandbox with the CLI.

can someone help me figuring out what I am doing wrong?
Is there a beta we might need to ask to join? how to if possible?

PS I’m getting a 403 error

Cheers!

Hi <@U04DTBTCU2W> This is available for Sales or Service Hub enterprise. You need to first enrol to beta using Product updates > Betas section, and you will see the beta only if you are logged into Sales/Service hub ent account.
